text:
[Verse]
Walking down the alley
Moon lit sky so starry
Feel the night awaken
Footsteps softly shaking

[Verse 2]
Heartbeats are a drumline
Fingers snappin' in time
Shadows start to twirl now
Lost
But don't know how

[Chorus]
Dancing with the shadows
In the cool moonlight
Twistin' with the echoes
In the peaceful night

[Verse 3]
Streetlights shine so brightly
Casting dreams so lightly
Movement like a whisper
Night becomes a sister

[Chorus]
Dancing with the shadows
In the cool moonlight
Twistin' with the echoes
In the peaceful night

[Bridge]
Silent steps go swaying
In the night
Relaying
Messages are silent
Yet they feel so vibrant
title: Dancing with Shadows
